title: No more poppy in ARAM.
body: Sick of this bs. Sort it out rito. no skill required. press r right click adc

replies.body: Not even... Poppy is pretty okay at ARAM. She has a good stacking Armour and AD buff, she has a charge that can potentially stun, and an invincibility that makes her a godlike initiator. If you want a champ to complain about in ARAM, complain about Vel'Koz or Amumu, or some other champ with lots of AoE.
